EmailTemplate.subject: Maximize In-Flight comfort with Honeywell´s Ovation Select
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Is your cabin management system beginning to show its age, lacking some of the current technology and features you’ve grown accustomed to on the ground? Fortunately, with Honeywell's Ovation Select® cabin management system you won't have to worry about your cabin management becoming obsolete and holding you back from the technology you love. Honeywell´s Ovation Select offers passengers a broad range of cabin entertainment, control and integrated communications that maximize in-flight comfort and productivity.
You can access your cabin environment and entertainment controls from the convenience of your personal smart phone or tablet. Lighting, temperature, galley functions, shades, and audio/video can all be controlled from the convenience of your seat. With Ovation Select, you get a 100% digitally-driven cabin management and an entertainment solution that has been specifically designed to improve the in-flight experience and complement your cabin for many years to come.
Contact New United Goderich, our authorized dealer serving the US and Canada, to upgrade your cabin management and in-flight entertainment system today. Get information on aircraft models availability and schedule your upgrade.
